Reproducible.jl

    Docstrings
    Reproducible.CodeBlock — Type.
    CodeBlock(code::String, mod::Module)

    Object to represent code for a Reproducible renderer. The constructor parses/evaluates the code inside the provided module.

    Reproducible.CodeRow — Type.

    Object that represents a block of code. Fields are:

    • input (String): the input block of code
    • output (Any): the result of eval(parse(input))
    • repldisplay (String): string of what would get sent to REPL
    Reproducible.Reproducible

    Reproducible.block
    Reproducible.build — Function.
    build(path::String [, builddir::String]; frontmatter::String = "")
build(path::Vector{String} [, builddir::String]; frontmatter::String = "")

    Evaluate the markdown document(s) in path and put the output in builddir, beginning with frontmatter (since Julia's markdown parser does not support it).

    Reproducible.render — Function.
    render(o::CodeBlock, r::Val{:renderer}; kw...)::String

    Render a CodeBlock for the given :renderer, which can be used via

    ```julia; renderer;
...
```

    kw... always contains builddir.
